title: 25 Christmas Gifts ELLE Editors Are Giving This Season
excerpt: From fashion staples to top tech, ELLE editors weigh in on the gifts they're actually giving this season—and that will still arrive in time for Christmas.
text: Prada Lipstick Clutch Gift Set “I have a cousin who is the queen of makeup in the family. I can’t wait until she unwraps this lipstick kit on Christmas Day.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content leadAPL Nostalgia '87 Ivory“This year, I’ve decided these sneakers are the perfect item to gift the men in my life. I’ve grown tired of their gym shoes that were never meant to be worn with jeans and the same old lackluster ‘lifestyle’ sneakers that every college-aged boy wears ad nauseam. So, I’m taking matters into my own hands by gifting this major upgrade. “My dad is the reason I got into jogging and is a lifelong runner. I recently upgraded my runs with a smartwatch, and it has changed the way I run. Its training recommendations, detailed stats on my performance (even while I run), and just seamless GPS and integration with my phone have been wonderful. So when it came to Christmas, I couldn’t think of a better, very special gift to give to the man who fueled my own love of the sport to enhance his runs, too.”—Alyssa Bailey, Senior News and Strategy Editor

Everlane The Boxy Sweater

“When I was visiting my parents over Thanksgiving this year, one of the first things my mother asked was where I shopped for cotton sweaters. As someone who can’t stand itchy materials against my skin, I’ve spent a long time hunting for comfy sweaters that will survive multiple washes, and some of the best I’ve found are made at Everlane. This season’s Boxy Sweater is a personal favorite—which is why my mom and I will now be wearing matching ones this Christmas.”—Lauren Puckett-Pope, culture writer

“My mother-in-law already has everything she needs. So it can be hard to decide what to get her, but this precious notebook by Dior feels just right. She enjoys journaling and this will be another special place for her to write down her thoughts.”—ABP

Merit Retrospect™ L’Extrait de Parfum

“This new scent has become one of my personal favorites. It’s so good that I want every woman in my life to experience it, but I know my aunt who has quite a perfume collection will certainly appreciate the elegant scent.”—ABP

Ugg Classic Mini Alpine Boot

“My mom’s job keeps her on her feet for most of the day, and she tends to wear the same shoes throughout winter. When I noticed her current Uggs were looking a bit worse for wear, I decided it was time for a new set. I recently saw her eyeing the Classic Mini Alpines in a magazine, and I just know she’ll appreciate the upgrade.”—Leah Romero, Senior Digital Designer

The Artful Way to Plant-Based Cooking: Nourishing Recipes and Heartfelt Moments (A Cookbook)

“I grew up cooking and baking with my mom, so this gorgeous plant-based cookbook—put together by influencer and food photographer Chloé Crane-Leroux and her own mother—is a fitting gift and addition to her kitchen. It’s as much a feast for the eyes as it is for the stomach.”—AB

“Besides them being everywhere in 2024, bag or phone charms are really easy gifts for when you want something fun and personal yet wearable and affordable for a friends’ gift exchange. You can tailor them with a particular friend in mind, choosing trinkets, zodiac signs, initials, and favorite symbols to make it a really sweet, thoughtful gift.”—Madison Rexroat, accessories editor
